text: Mohammed Shahabuddin (born 10 December 1949) is a Bangladeshi lawyer and politician who is the 16th and current President of Bangladesh since 2023. He is a member of the Awami League. Before being elected president, he was a judge and commissioner of the Anti-Corruption Commission from 2011 to 2016. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Bangladesh Category:Current national leaders Category:Judges Category:Bangladeshi lawyers
title: Mohammed Shahabuddin
